biography:
Gracia Querejeta was born on August 13, 1962 in Madrid, Spain. She is a director and writer, known for Seven Billiard Tables (2007), By My Side Again (1999) and Cordelias (2014).

Daughter of the costume designer Maiki Marín and the director/ producer Elías Querejeta.
name: Gracia Querejeta
